text: Can anyone think of a clever way to override `setproperty!` (or something) to allow the syntax `nt.a = 1`  when `nt` is a `NamedTuple` and `a` is length-1 array? i.e. it should be equivalent to `nt.a[1] = 1` . Would be a nice convenience syntax in my case. I suppose a macro would also be possible...
